listitem.para: A character string containing Unix sh instruction
maximum allowed time to execution in milliseconds

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Sends a string command-name to Unix for execution by the command interpreter (sh under Unix, or command.com under DOS). Standard output and standard errors of the shell command are written in the calling shell.
host returns command interpreter return code. In case of timeout, host returns -1.
